main event: A UFO sighting occurred on January 27, 1957, near San Antonio, Texas, involving a large, bright, luminous object that turned pink as the sun went down.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 2 minutes,The object was described as very large and bright,It was observed to stay stationary before moving up and disappearing,The weather was clear, and the sun was setting,An official conclusion suggested it was possibly a balloon reflecting sunlight.
witness description: Mr. and Mrs. (age 33), real estate developer
